name: Wizards vs Lemons
description:
Jam: https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2022

Theme: cliché

Game Idea: Create an idle game using "When life gives you lemons, make lemonade"

Possible features for the game:

  • Click:
    • Wizard will attack Lemons on click (There will be Lightning, Ice and Fire wizards)
  •  Reset feature will be triggered when all your wizards die, so:
    • Lemons will attack wizards
    • Wizard should have health points
    • Longer the game, harder the lemons (magic resistance and/or imunity to certain kind of spells)
  • Auto-Click
    • Attacking lemons
    • Buying health potions
    • Using health potions
  • Upgrades
    • Tech-tree (Wizard damage, greater healing power, faster cooldown for potions, etc)
  • Looting
    • Health potions drop chance when killing Lemons
  • Conversation
    • Boss dialogs
    • Interactive sentences from Wizard and/or Lemons ("Easy peasy lemon squeezy", "Piece of cake", "Too easy", etc)
  • Story
    • This idle game should not be a neverending game (neverending story) because we have to make lemonade! (That is why we need some story here ^_^)
  • Boots
    • Mini-games for temporary upgrading boost
  • Particle System
    • Wizard spell should be fun as well (explosion, spell casting)

Got any cool idea?

  • Just let me know, leave a comment bellow :D
